price: 18.Sinaamey isin Yallih niqmoota lowtan way loowo teetik magacissan, diggah Yalli dambi cabti-li xuwaw-li kinni.
arabic: وَإِن تَعُدُّواْ نِعۡمَةَ ٱللَّهِ لَا تُحۡصُوهَآۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَغَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-in taʿuddū niʿ'mata al-lahi lā tuḥ'ṣūhā inna al-laha laghafūrun raḥīmun
